translations: [解剖]心；内心；中心；同情心；心形物（heart 的复数）
铭记；用心材支撑（heart 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: His gruff exterior concealed one of the kindest hearts.
sentences.translation: 他不友好的外表下藏着一颗最善良的心。

sentences.sentence: His footballing skills and extrovert personality won the hearts of the public.
sentences.translation: 他的足球技巧和外向的个性赢得了公众的心。
